data.oai_dc:dc: This is a shapefile containing the location of patches of yellow-cedar trees in yellow-cedar stands in our Juneau Study Area. The geographic coordinates of patches are also listed in the "Juneau_Yellow_Cedar_Stand_Locations.csv" file in this data package and are shown in Figure 1. A companion manuscript, Krapek, J., Hennon, P.E., D'Amore, D.V., and Buma, B. "Despite available habitat at range edge, yellow-cedar migration is punctuated with a past pulse tied to colder conditions." Diversity and Distributions, 2017, describes yellow-cedar stand and patch mapping methodology in detail.
dispersal|biotic interactions|climate change|punctuated range extension|range shift|yellow-cedar|competition|persistence niche
